info.name: Gipza API v2 Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Gipza Backend v2 - All endpoints with validation

item.name: Health Check

request.description: Check if the server is running and healthy

item.description: Server health check endpoints

item.name: Authentication
Public

request.description: Send OTP to user's phone number. For test numbers (9841543993, 9576320804), OTP is hardcoded as 123456.
Verify OTP and receive access token and refresh token. Access token expires in 15 minutes, refresh token expires in 30 days.
Refresh access token using refresh token. Use this when access token expires (after 15 minutes).

item.description: Public authentication endpoints - no authentication required

item.name: User

request.description: Get current authenticated user's profile. Requires Bearer token in Authorization header.
Logout user and invalidate refresh token. Requires Bearer token in Authorization header.

item.description: User authentication endpoints - requires authentication
Authentication endpoints for OTP-based login, token management, and user profile

item.name: Users

request.description:
Get current authenticated user's profile with all details including addresses and wishlist. Requires authentication.

**Response includes:**
- User details (name, email, phoneNumber, role, gender, dateOfBirth)
- Addresses array
- Wishlist array (product IDs)
- Timestamps (createdAt, updatedAt)

Update user profile. All fields are optional. Requires authentication.

**Allowed fields:**
- `name`: String (2-50 characters)
- `email`: Valid email format
- `phoneNumber`: 10 digits (Indian format)
- `gender`: Enum (male, female, non-binary, prefer not to say)
- `dateOfBirth`: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (must be in the past)

**Validation:**
- At least one field must be provided for update
- Phone number must be 10 digits
- Email must be valid format
- Date of birth must be in YYYY-MM-DD format and in the past
Get all addresses for the current user. Requires authentication.

Add a new address to user's address list. Requires authentication.

**Required:**
- At least one of: street, city, or state

**Optional fields:**
- `street`: String
- `city`: String
- `state`: String
- `zipCode`: 6 digits
- `country`: String
- `phone`: 10-13 digits (Indian format with optional +91)
- `name`: Contact name
- `relationship`: String

**Validation:**
- Zip code must be exactly 6 digits
- Phone number must be 10-13 characters (supports +91 prefix)

Update an existing address. All fields are optional. Requires authentication.

**Path Parameter:**
- `addressId`: MongoDB ObjectId (24 hex characters)

**Optional fields:**
- `street`: String
- `city`: String
- `state`: String
- `zipCode`: 6 digits
- `country`: String
- `phone`: 10-13 digits (Indian format with optional +91)
- `name`: Contact name
- `relationship`: String

**Validation:**
- Address ID must be valid MongoDB ObjectId
- At least one field must be provided for update
- Zip code must be exactly 6 digits if provided

Delete an address from user's address list. Requires authentication.

**Path Parameter:**
- `addressId`: MongoDB ObjectId (24 hex characters)

**Validation:**
- Address ID must be valid MongoDB ObjectId

Add a product to user's wishlist. Requires authentication.

**Path Parameter:**
- `productId`: MongoDB ObjectId (24 hex characters)

**Validation:**
- Product ID must be valid MongoDB ObjectId
- Product must exist in database

Remove a product from user's wishlist. Requires authentication.

**Path Parameter:**
- `productId`: MongoDB ObjectId (24 hex characters)

**Validation:**
- Product ID must be valid MongoDB ObjectId

item.description: User management endpoints - profile, addresses, and wishlist

item.name: Categories
Public

request.description: Get all categories. Public endpoint - no authentication required. Supports search and sort query parameters.
Get single category by ID. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

item.description: Public category endpoints - no authentication required

item.name: Admin

request.description: Create a new category. Requires authentication and admin/manager role. Image URL is optional.
Update an existing category. Requires authentication and admin/manager role. All fields are optional.
Delete a category. Requires authentication and admin/manager role. Cannot delete if products are using this category.

Category management endpoints - public read access, admin/manager write access

Public

request.description: Get all colors. Public endpoint - no authentication required. Supports search and sort query parameters.
Get single color by ID. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

request.description: Create a new color. Requires authentication and admin/manager role. Hex color code is optional (defaults to #FFFFFF).
Update an existing color. Requires authentication and admin/manager role. All fields are optional.
Delete a color. Requires authentication and admin/manager role. Cannot delete if products are using this color.

item.description: Admin color endpoints - requires authentication and admin role
Color management endpoints - public read access, admin/manager write access

Public

request.description: Get all products with pagination and filters. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Search products with advanced filters. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Search products with advanced filters (POST method). Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Get unique product tags (max 40). Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Get combo deals with filters. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

exec: // Store product ID for later use

request.description: Get single product by ID with related products and add-ons. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Get similar products based on category. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

item.name: User

request.description: Add a review to a product. Requires authentication. Rating must be 1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0, or 5.0.

request.description: Create a new product. Requires authentication and admin/manager role. SKU must be unique.

item.description: Admin/Manager product endpoints - requires authentication and admin/manager role
Product management endpoints - public read access, authenticated user reviews, admin/manager write access

item.name: Orders
Public

request.description:
Calculate shipping cost for a product before order creation. Supports both manual (distance-based) and automatic (Delhivery) delivery modes. For combined modes (automatic+manual), tries manual first, then falls back to automatic. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

**Response includes:**
- `serviceable`: boolean - Whether delivery is available
- `cost`: number - Shipping cost in rupees
- `deliveryMode`: 'manual' | 'automatic' - Actual delivery method used
- `estimatedDelivery`: number - Estimated delivery days
- `distance`: number (for manual) - Distance in km
- `message`: string - Status message

Check if a pincode is serviceable by Delhivery for automatic delivery. This checks Delhivery's serviceability API. Public endpoint - no authentication required.

**Response includes:**
- `serviceable`: boolean - Whether pincode is serviceable
- `message`: string - Serviceability status message
Validate and calculate discount for a coupon code. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Track multiple orders by waybill numbers. Public endpoint - no authentication required.
Razorpay webhook endpoint for payment notifications. Public endpoint - signature verified internally.

item.description: Public order endpoints - no authentication required

item.name: User

exec: // Store order ID for later use

request.description: Create a new order. Requires authentication. Supports multi-vendor orders. Payment method: 'prepaid' or 'cod'.
List all orders for the authenticated user with pagination and filters. Requires authentication.
Get complete order details with tracking information. Requires authentication.
Initiate Razorpay payment for a prepaid order. Requires authentication. Returns Razorpay order details.

Confirm payment and update order status. Automatically creates shipments for vendor orders with automatic delivery (shipping_method === 'automatic'). Skips manual delivery orders. Requires authentication.

**Request Body:**
- `order_id`: string (required) - Razorpay order ID
- `payment_id`: string (required) - Razorpay payment ID
- `signature`: string (required) - Payment signature

**Response includes:**
- `shipments`: array - Successfully created shipments
- `failed_shipments`: array - Failed shipment attempts
- `manual_orders`: array - Manual delivery orders (skipped)
- `summary`: object - Summary of shipment creation

Get real-time tracking information for an order. Tracks all vendor orders within the main order. Only tracks vendor orders with waybill numbers (automatic delivery). Manual delivery orders won't have tracking. Requires authentication.

**Response includes:**
- `order_id`: string - User order ID
- `tracking`: array - Tracking info per vendor order with waybill
  - `sub_order_id`: string
  - `waybill`: string
  - `tracking`: object - Delhivery tracking data

Track multiple orders from different vendors. Returns tracking information grouped by order and vendor. Only tracks vendor orders with waybill numbers (automatic delivery). Requires authentication.

**Request Body:**
- `orderIds`: string[] (required) - Array of user order IDs

**Response includes:**
- `results`: array - Tracking results per order
  - `order_id`: string - User order ID
  - `tracking`: array - Tracking info per vendor order
Cancel an order. Refund is initiated if payment was made. Requires authentication.
Request refund for a paid order. Requires authentication.

item.description: User order endpoints - requires authentication

item.name: Admin

request.description: Get all orders for admin dashboard. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get all orders for a specific user. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Update order status manually. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Manually create shipments for an order. Only creates shipments for vendor orders with automatic delivery (shipping_method === 'automatic'). Skips manual delivery orders. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Note:** Shipments are automatically created after payment confirmation for automatic delivery orders. Use this endpoint to manually create shipments if needed.

**Response includes:**
- `shipments`: array - Shipment creation results per vendor order
- `waybills`: array - Created waybill numbers

Manually update delivery tracking status for a vendor order. Used for manual delivery orders or to update automatic delivery tracking. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Request Body:**
- `waybill`: string (required) - Waybill number
- `status`: string (required) - Tracking status (e.g., 'out_for_delivery', 'delivered')
- `location`: string (optional) - Current location
- `remarks`: string (optional) - Additional notes
Test Delhivery API connectivity and rate calculation. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get status of background tracking job and statistics. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Manually trigger background tracking job to update order tracking for all active orders with waybills. This syncs tracking status from Delhivery API for automatic delivery orders. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `ordersProcessed`: number - Total orders processed
- `ordersUpdated`: number - Orders with status updates
- `errors`: number - Number of errors encountered

Update vendor details. Requires authentication and admin role.
Delete a vendor. Requires authentication and admin role. Cannot delete if products are using this vendor.

Save a vendor list. Requires authentication and admin role. Type can be: vendor, pincode, category, tag, productTag, size, color, occasion, theme_banner, theme_tabs, theme_sections, theme_pincode.

query.description: Sort field, prefix with - for descending (optional)

Get a single banner by ID. Public.

item.name: Tickets

body.raw:
{
    "subject": "Order not delivered",
    "description": "Order #123 was not delivered on time. Please look into it.",
    "category": "delivery",
    "priority": "high",
    "imageUrl": "",
    "orderId": ""
}

request.description: Create a support ticket. Body: subject (required), description (required), category (required), priority (optional: low | medium | high, default medium), imageUrl (optional URL), orderId (optional MongoDB ObjectId of linked order). Requires authentication.

query.description: Filter: true | false (tickets with/without linked order)

request.description: Get current user's tickets. Query: status (optional), category (optional), hasOrder (optional: true | false). Requires authentication.
Get ticket details by ID. Allowed for ticket owner or admin/manager. Path: id (ticket ObjectId). Requires authentication.
Add a comment to a ticket. Body: text (required), imageUrl (optional URL). Allowed for ticket owner or admin/manager. Path: id (ticket ObjectId). Requires authentication.

item.description: User ticket/support endpoints. Create ticket, list my tickets, get ticket by ID, add comment. All require authentication. Admin ticket management is under Admin > Tickets.

item.name: Occasion Sections

request.description: Get all occasion sections with optional active filter. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get a specific occasion section by its ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

exec: pm.test("Response has created occasion section", function () {

request.description: Create occasion section. First upload image via POST /upload/image to get { url, key }, then send JSON with name, description?, image?, image_key?, isActive?, order?. Name must be unique. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

exec: pm.test("Response has updated occasion section", function () {

request.description: Update occasion section. Send JSON: name?, description?, image?, image_key?, isActive?, order?. Use image + image_key (from POST /upload/image) to replace image. At least one field required. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Delete an occasion section by its ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

item.description: Occasion section management endpoints for creating and managing occasion sections (e.g., Birthday, Anniversary, etc.). All routes require authentication and admin/manager role.

item.name: Upload

request.description: Upload a single image to S3. Use multipart/form-data with field name 'image'. Max size 10MB. Returns url, key, etag. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Upload a single video to S3. Use multipart/form-data with field name 'video'. Max size 100MB. Returns url, key, etag. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

item.description: Upload images and videos to S3. All routes require authentication and admin/manager role. Use multipart/form-data: field 'image' for image (max 10MB), field 'video' for video (max 100MB).

item.name: Admin
Dashboard

query.description: Start date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)
End date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)

request.description:
Get comprehensive dashboard statistics including overview, orders, revenue, payments, users, products, vendors, and categories. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `overview`: Total orders, revenue, users, products, vendors, average order value, recent orders, today's orders and revenue
- `orders`: Status breakdown, payment method breakdown, counts by status
- `revenue`: Total, pending, COD, prepaid revenue, average order value, today's revenue
- `payments`: Paid, pending, failed, refunded counts
- `users`: Total customers, admins, managers, executives
- `products`: Total, active, out of stock counts
- `vendors`: Total, active, registered warehouses
- `categories`: Total categories

query.description: Number of recent orders to fetch (optional, default: 10, max: 100)

request.description:
Get recent orders for dashboard display. Returns the most recent orders with customer information, status, payment details, and shipping address. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `data`: Array of recent orders with orderId, customer (name, email, phone), status, paymentStatus, paymentMethod, amount, date, shippingAddress
- `count`: Number of orders returned

query.description: Grouping period: daily, weekly, or monthly (optional, default: daily)
Number of days to fetch data for (optional, default: 30, max: 365)

request.description:
Get sales chart data for visualization. Returns revenue and order counts grouped by the specified period. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `data`: Array of chart data points with date, revenue, and orders
- `period`: The grouping period used (daily, weekly, monthly)
- `days`: Number of days of data included

**Chart Data Format:**
Each data point contains:
- `date`: Date string (YYYY-MM-DD for daily, YYYY-MM-DD for weekly start, YYYY-MM for monthly)
- `revenue`: Total revenue for that period
- `orders`: Number of orders for that period

query.description: Number of top products to fetch (optional, default: 10, max: 100)
Start date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)
End date filter in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional)

request.description:
Get top selling products based on quantity sold. Returns products sorted by total quantity sold with revenue and order statistics. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `data`: Array of top products with:
  - `productId`: Product ID
  - `name`: Product name
  - `totalQuantity`: Total quantity sold
  - `totalRevenue`: Total revenue from this product
  - `orderCount`: Number of orders containing this product
  - `averageOrderValue`: Average order value for this product
  - `productDetails`: Full product details (if product exists) including images, price, stock, status, SKU
- `count`: Number of products returned

item.description: Admin dashboard endpoints - requires authentication and admin/manager role

query.description: Filter by role: customer, admin, manager, executive (optional)
Search by name, email, or phone (optional)

request.description: Get all users with pagination. Supports filtering by role and search. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get user details by ID including order statistics. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Update user details. Allowed fields: name, email, phoneNumber, role, gender, dateOfBirth, addresses, fcmToken. Password cannot be updated through this endpoint. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Delete a user. Cannot delete users with existing orders. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

query.description: Search query - searches in name, email, phoneNumber, or user ID (required)

request.description: Search users by name, email, phone number, or user ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

query.description: Start date filter in ISO 8601 format (optional)
End date filter in ISO 8601 format (optional)

request.description:
List all orders with pagination and advanced filtering. Returns orders with user details, vendor orders summary, and pagination info. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `orders`: Array of orders with user details, vendor orders summary, payment info
- `pagination`: Current page, total pages, total orders, limit, has_next_page, has_prev_page
- `filters_applied`: Applied filter values

Get detailed order information including full vendor order details with vendor information, product details, tracking info, and status history. Supports both order _id and user_order_id. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- Complete order details with user information
- Full vendor orders with vendor details (name, contact, address, warehouse info)
- Product details with customization info
- Tracking history and status history
- Refund and settlement information

Update order details. Allowed fields: status, payment_status, payment_method, amounts, shipping_address, vendor_orders, refund_info, extra_data, order metadata. Status changes are automatically added to status_history. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Reassign order to a different user. Updates the order's user_id and logs the reassignment history in extra_data.metadata.reassignment_history. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Update manual shipment details for a vendor order. All fields are optional. If waybill_no is provided without status, defaults to 'shipped'. Expected_arrival can only be updated for manual delivery orders. Status updates are automatically added to tracking. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `waybill_no`: Tracking number
- `shipping_provider`: Shipping company name
- `shipping_cost`: Shipping cost
- `expected_arrival`: Expected delivery date (ISO 8601)
- `note`: Additional notes
- `status`: Order status (processing, ready_to_ship, shipped, out_for_delivery, delivered, cancelled, pending, failed)
- `shipping_method`: manual, automatic, automatic+manual, manual+automatic

Cancel an order. Updates order status to 'cancelled' and optionally processes refund and cancels shipments. All fields are optional. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `cancel_reason`: Reason for cancellation
- `refund_amount`: Amount to refund (optional)
- `cancel_shipments`: Whether to cancel associated shipments (optional, boolean)
- `admin_note`: Internal admin note (optional)

exec: pm.test("Response confirms vendor order cancellation", function () {

request.description:
Cancel a specific vendor order within an order. Cannot cancel delivered vendor orders. If all vendor orders are cancelled, the main order status is updated to 'cancelled'. Optional partial refund can be processed. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `cancel_reason`: Reason for cancellation
- `refund_amount`: Partial refund amount (optional, cannot exceed vendor order total)
- `admin_note`: Internal admin note (optional)

Cancel a specific product from a vendor order. If all products in a vendor order are cancelled, the vendor order status is updated to 'cancelled'. If all vendor orders are cancelled, the main order status is updated to 'cancelled'. Optional partial refund can be processed. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `cancel_reason`: Reason for cancellation
- `refund_amount`: Partial refund amount (optional, cannot exceed product total)
- `admin_note`: Internal admin note (optional)

Process a partial or full refund for an order. Refund amount cannot exceed order total. If refund amount equals or exceeds order total, payment status is updated to 'refunded'. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `refund_amount`: Refund amount (required, must be > 0)
- `refund_reason`: Reason for refund (optional)
- `admin_note`: Internal admin note (optional)

exec: pm.test("Response has bulk operation results", function () {

request.description:
Perform bulk operations on multiple orders. Supported operations: cancel, update_status, delete. Returns results and errors for each order. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Operations:**
- `cancel`: Cancel multiple orders
- `update_status`: Update status of multiple orders (requires `operation_data.status`)
- `delete`: Soft delete multiple orders

**Fields:**
- `operation`: Operation type (required: cancel, update_status, or delete)
- `order_ids`: Array of order IDs (required)
- `operation_data`: Additional data for operation (optional)
  - For `update_status`: `{ "status": "processing", "note": "Bulk update" }`
  - For `cancel` or `delete`: `{ "note": "Bulk operation note" }`

Soft delete an order. Sets is_deleted to true and logs deletion details. All fields are optional. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `delete_reason`: Reason for deletion (optional)
- `admin_note`: Internal admin note (optional)

query.description: Filter by category ID or name (optional)
Filter by vendor ID or name (optional)
Search in name, SKU, or description (optional)
Filter by stock status: in_stock, out_of_stock, low_stock (optional)

request.description:
List all products with enhanced filters for admin. Returns products with vendor info, category details, and stock status. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `products`: Array of products with vendor details, category names, stock status
- `pagination`: Current page, total pages, total products, limit, has_next_page, has_prev_page
- `filters_applied`: Applied filter values

Get detailed product information including full vendor details, category information, enriched reviews with user details, stock status, and average rating. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- Complete product details with vendor information (name, contact, address, warehouse)
- Enriched category information with names and descriptions
- Reviews with user details (name, email, phone)
- Stock status (in_stock, out_of_stock, low_stock)
- Average rating calculation
Create a new product. All product fields are validated. SKU is auto-generated if not provided. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Update product details. Any product field can be updated. Stock, price, and status changes are validated. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Soft delete a product. Sets is_deleted to true or status to 'draft'. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Update product status. Valid values: draft, published. Status transitions are validated. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Update product stock quantity. Stock must be a non-negative integer. Stock changes are tracked. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Duplicate a product with a new SKU and optional new name. All product data is copied. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `newSku`: New SKU for duplicated product (required)
- `newName`: New name for duplicated product (optional)
- `overrides`: Object with fields to override in duplicated product (optional)

Add a video to a product. Upload video URL and metadata. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `url`: Video URL (required)
- `key`: S3 key for deletion (required)
- `title`: Video title (optional)
- `description`: Video description (optional)
- `duration`: Duration in seconds (optional)
- `size`: File size in bytes (optional)
Update product video details. All fields are optional. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Remove a video from a product. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Save product lists (categories, tags, pincodes, etc.) for reuse. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `lists`: Object with list types as keys (categories, tags, pincodes, etc.)
  - Each list type has: `name` (required), `description` (optional), `content` (array or string, required)

query.description: Search in name, email, city, or contact number (optional)
Filter by warehouse status: pending, registered, failed, retrying (optional)

request.description:
List all vendors with enhanced filters for admin. Returns vendors with warehouse status information and pagination. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `vendors`: Array of vendors with warehouse status summary (warehouse_status, warehouse_registered, warehouse_retry_count, warehouse_error)
- `pagination`: Current page, total pages, total vendors, limit, has_next_page, has_prev_page
- `filters_applied`: Applied filter values

Get detailed warehouse registration status for a vendor. Returns warehouse registration details including status, retry count, error messages, and whether retry is possible. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `warehouse`: Complete warehouse registration details (name, status, retry_count, max_retries, last_attempt, error_message, delhivery_warehouse_id, timestamps)
- `is_registered`: Boolean indicating if warehouse is registered
- `can_retry`: Boolean indicating if warehouse registration can be retried
- `retries_remaining`: Number of retries remaining

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Sample Vendor",
    "email": "vendor@example.com",
    "address": "123 Vendor Street",
    "pincode": "560001",
    "city": "Bangalore",
    "state": "Karnataka",
    "country": "India",
    "contactName": "John Doe",
    "contactNumber": "9876543210",
    "notes": "Vendor notes",
    "delhiveryPickupLocationName": "Sample Vendor_gipza",
    "gstin": "29ABCDE1234F1Z5",
    "status": "published",
    "deliverablePincodes": ["560001", "560002"]
}

request.description:
Create a new vendor. Warehouse registration is automatically attempted. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Required Fields:**
- `name`: Vendor/Company name
- `address`: Street address
- `pincode`: 6-digit pincode
- `city`: City name
- `state`: State name
- `contactNumber`: Contact phone number

**Optional Fields:**
- `email`: Vendor email
- `country`: Country (default: India)
- `contactName`: Contact person name
- `notes`: Additional notes
- `delhiveryPickupLocationName`: Delhivery pickup location name
- `gstin`: GSTIN number
- `status`: draft or published (default: published)
- `deliverablePincodes`: Array of deliverable pincodes
Update vendor details. All fields are optional. Products array cannot be updated directly (managed separately). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Delete a vendor. Cannot delete vendors with associated products. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Retry warehouse registration for a vendor. Resets retry count and attempts to register the vendor's warehouse with Delhivery. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Response includes:**
- `success`: Boolean indicating if registration was successful
- `message`: Success or error message
- `data.warehouse`: Updated warehouse registration details
- `error`: Error message if registration failed

Save a vendor list for reuse. Supports various list types. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `name`: List name (required)
- `description`: List description (optional)
- `type`: List type (required): vendor, pincode, category, tag, productTag, size, color, occasion, theme_banner, theme_tabs, theme_sections, theme_pincode
- `content`: List content - can be array or string (required)

query.description: Sort order: name, -name, createdAt, -createdAt (optional, default: name)

request.description: Get all categories with optional search and sorting. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get category details by ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Create a new category. Category name must be unique (case-insensitive). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `name`: Category name (required, 2-50 characters)
- `image`: Category image URL (optional)
Update category details. At least one field (name or image) must be provided. Category name must be unique (case-insensitive). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Delete a category. Cannot delete categories that are being used by products. The system will check if any products are using this category before deletion. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

query.description: Sort order: name, -name, createdAt, -createdAt (optional, default: name)

request.description: Get all colors with optional search and sorting. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get color details by ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Create a new color. Color name must be unique (case-insensitive). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `name`: Color name (required, 2-50 characters)
- `hex`: Hex color code in #RGB or #RRGGBB format (optional, default: #FFFFFF)
Update color details. At least one field (name or hex) must be provided. Color name must be unique (case-insensitive). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Delete a color. Cannot delete colors that are being used by products. The system will check if any products are using this color before deletion. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get all coupons with pagination and optional filters. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get coupon details by ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get coupon usage statistics including usage count, total discount applied, and recent orders. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Create a new coupon. Coupon code must be unique (case-insensitive). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

**Fields:**
- `code`: Coupon code (required, 2-50 characters, will be converted to uppercase)
- `discountType`: Type of discount - 'percentage' or 'fixed' (required)
- `discountValue`: Discount value (required, positive number, max 100 for percentage)
- `minPurchase`: Minimum purchase amount (optional, default: 0)
- `expiryDate`: Expiry date in YYYY-MM-DD format (required)
- `isActive`: Whether coupon is active (optional, default: true)
Update coupon details. At least one field must be provided. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Activate a coupon. Sets isActive to true. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Deactivate a coupon. Sets isActive to false. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Delete a coupon permanently. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

query.description: Group by: date, product, or category (optional, default: date)

request.description: Get sales report with optional date range and grouping. Returns sales data grouped by date, product, or category. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

query.description: Period: daily, weekly, or monthly (optional, default: daily)

request.description: Get revenue report with daily/weekly/monthly breakdown. Includes COD vs Prepaid breakdown. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get customer analytics including new customers count, top customers by spending, and customer lifetime value. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get product analytics including top selling products, low stock products, out of stock products, and product performance metrics. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get inventory status including stock levels by product, low stock alerts, and stock summary. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get order analytics including order status breakdown, order trends over time, and average order value trends. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
List all banners (admin). Optional: active, type, sort. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get banner by ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Create a banner. First upload image via POST /upload/image to get { url, key }, then send JSON with name, type, image, image_key, active?, sortOrder?. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Update banner. Send JSON: name?, type?, active?, sortOrder?, or image + image_key (from POST /upload/image) to replace image. Old image deleted from S3 when replacing. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Delete banner and remove image from S3. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

item.name: Tickets

query.description: Filter: true | false (tickets with/without linked order)

request.description: List all support tickets. Query: status (optional), category (optional), priority (optional), hasOrder (optional: true | false). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Update ticket status. Body: status (required)  one of: open | in-progress | resolved | closed. Path: id (ticket ObjectId). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Assign ticket to an admin or manager user. Body: assignedTo (required)  MongoDB ObjectId of a user with role admin or manager. Path: id (ticket ObjectId). Sets ticket status to in-progress. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

item.description: Admin ticket/support management. List all tickets, update status, assign to admin/manager. All require authentication and admin/manager role.

item.name: Lists

query.description: Filter: vendor, pincode, category, tag, productTag, size, color, occasion, theme_banner, theme_tabs, theme_sections, theme_pincode

request.description: Get all lists with optional type filter. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

Save a new list. Body: name (required), description (optional), type (required), content (required, array or object). Type must be one of: vendor, pincode, category, tag, productTag, size, color, occasion, theme_banner, theme_tabs, theme_sections, theme_pincode. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Get a list by ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Update a list. Body: name (optional), description (optional), content (optional). At least one field required. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Delete a list by ID. Requires authentication and admin/manager role.
Delete a list by ID (alternative path). Requires authentication and admin/manager role.

item.description: List management (admin only). Get all lists, save list, get by ID, update, delete. Types: vendor, pincode, category, tag, productTag, size, color, occasion, theme_banner, theme_tabs, theme_sections, theme_pincode. All require authentication and admin/manager role.

Admin management endpoints - dashboard statistics, analytics, user management, order management, product management, vendor management, category management, color management, coupon management, analytics & reports, banner management, ticket management, and list management. All routes require authentication and admin/manager role.
